wikipedia_page.main: Richard Henry Yapp (1871–1929) was an English botanist and an early ecologist, who held the Chair of Botany in Queen's University, Belfast, and the Mason Professorship of Botany at the University of Birmingham.

link_mentions.page: List of Queen's University Belfast people

response: The ecology of the Fen was studied in the first decade of the 1900s, by Richard Henry Yapp.

response: I am grateful to User:Tetizeraz who tells me that they have translated Richard Henry Yapp to Portuguese. As far as I know, it's the first time that an article with all of its citations in  has been translated from one language to another.
